result_list.explanation: The stage direction 'AIR : Changement pique l'appétit.' indicates music, as it starts with 'AIR' and describes a tune.
The stage direction 'Elle fuit les Égyptiens.' describes movement, specifically fleeing.
The stage direction 'Frappant du pied.' describes a general action of stamping the foot.
The stage direction 'Le poussant du coude.' describes non-verbal interaction, specifically pushing with the elbow.
The stage direction 'Elle lui donne la lettre, il lit tout bas à part.' describes interaction with an object (the letter) and reading it.
result_list.stgdir: Elle lui donne la lettre, il lit tout bas à part.

result_list.explanation: The stage direction 'Apercevant la Présidente.' describes a general action of noticing someone.
The stage direction 'Dorame et Oronte viennent.' indicates the entrance of characters onto the stage.
The stage direction 'En disant le dernier hémistiche elle remonte le théâtre et va pour sortir.' describes the character exiting the stage.
result_list.stgdir: En disant le dernier hémistiche elle remonte le théâtre et va pour sortir.

result_list.explanation: The stage direction 'Il frappe Scaramouche de toute sa force.' describes a violent action, specifically hitting someone.
result_list.stgdir: Il frappe Scaramouche de toute sa force.

result_list.explanation: The stage direction 'Lisant son mémoire.' describes a general action of reading.
